main event: A witness reported seeing an unidentified object that looked like an electric light climbing steadily in Arlington, Virginia during the solar eclipse on 22 July 1963.
interesting points: The sighting was reported during a solar eclipse., The object appeared to move in a steady climb and was reported to be reminiscent of a weather balloon., The witness reported another Jupiter-sized stationary object appearing in the same area., The object was observed for about 2 minutes., The witness also noted similar phenomena occurring over the nights of July 25th and 26th.
sighted object: an electric light climbing resembling a weather balloon
witness description: A 50-year-old female resident who reported the sighting.
